document_data.name: ''Helm of Heroes''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Helms of heroes''''' were [[enchanted]] [[helmet]]s that offered limited protection to the wearer, popularized in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Helms of heroes'' slightly improved the wearer's protection against mundane and magical dangers, as well as [[spell]] effects. The enchantments also made the helmets bright and shiny, never needing a polish.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, various ''helms of heroes'' could be found among bandits and heroes of the [[Sword Coast]], areas surrounding the city of [[Neverwinter]].
